Class User.Teamware 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----User.Teamware
public class Teamware
extends Object
Teamware is the main program for running the Teamware Process Support System. This system is designed to improve team coordination and managerial control of software development teams. Teamware allows users to explicitly define their software development processes and provides extensive execution support. In addition, Teamware is designed for non-technical as well as technical users, and appropriate for use by manager, process programmers, system programmers, domain experts, and end-users (including WWW process guidance support). The Teamware system is made up of three architectural components, the User, System, and Foundation levels.
See Also:
User, System, Foundation
